feed.title: P3 Systems Biology Lab
feed.subtitle: Welcome to P3 (Predict, Perturb & Profile) Systems Biology Lab.

entry.title: NCI P01 awarded
entry.content: Our collaborative team at UVA is awarded a five-year NCI P01 grant. https://news.med.virginia.edu/research/uva-research-team-awarded-13-million-to-lead-national-study-seeking-new-treatments-for-acute-myeloid-leukemia/
entry.summary: Our collaborative team at UVA is awarded a five-year NCI P01 grant. https://news.med.virginia.edu/research/uva-research-team-awarded-13-million-to-lead-national-study-seeking-new-treatments-for-acute-myeloid-leukemia/

entry.title: Paper featured
entry.content: Our research paper published in Blood Advances is highlighted in UVA News. https://news.med.virginia.edu/research/uva-researchers-blood-cancer-discovery-identifies-high-risk-patients-could-improve-outcomes/
entry.summary: Our research paper published in Blood Advances is highlighted in UVA News. https://news.med.virginia.edu/research/uva-researchers-blood-cancer-discovery-identifies-high-risk-patients-could-improve-outcomes/
